## Vector2.Lerp() method

Returns a new Vector2 located for "amount" (float) on the linear interpolation between the vector "start" adn the vector "end".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Lerp(start: ReadOnlyVector2, end: ReadOnlyVector2, amount: number): Vector2;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  start | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | defines the start vector |
|  end | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | defines the end vector |
|  amount | <code>number</code> | defines the interpolation factor |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector2`

a new Vector2
